page.title: 10COLESBOURNE RECREATION.
page.content: There used to be a school at Colesbourne but it was closed in 1960. Now all the children go to Coberly school until they are 11, after 11 they go to a school in Cheltenham. The school building has now become the village hall.It is used weekly for Bingo and for other village functions. There is an Inn called Colesbourne Inn.It is just over a 100 years old and was built when the new main road was built through the village.It was the first stop for stage coaches to change horses after leaving Cheltenham Every two hours Colesbourne has a local bus service along the Cheltenham and Cirencester road although many people use their own cars.
